description: This Java class defines a Data Transfer Object (DTO) named RegisterRequest for user registration, containing validation annotations and fields for email, password, and full name.

classes.name: RegisterRequest
classes.description: A DTO for capturing user registration data, including validation constraints for email, password, and full name.
